content: back to main color for the foot round 1 k to 3 sts before the instep you will be picking up stitches along the begins k2tog k1 knit across instep in slip_stitch edge of the heel flap including pattern k1 ssk knit to end of round 1 extra stitch in the gap continuing round 2 k all sts pattern across instep and then picking up stitches on the other side of heel flap repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have setup round 56 64 72 stitches repeating the instep - k across the first 8 9 10 st of the heel pattern as written above and place a marker this will now be the beginning of your round move the stitch marker back to the - k across the last 8 9 10 stitches of the beginning of the round heel - pick up and knit 14 16 18 stitches foot along the side of the heel flap -pick up and knit 1 extra stitch in the continue knitting the foot until the foot ladder in the row below and knit through length measures 1 5 1 75 2 inches the back loop shorter than your desired length - k across the instep stitches in pattern beginning with round 1 toe - pick up and knit 1 extra stitch in the if using contrasting toe color switch to ladder in the row below and knit through contrast color the back loop - pick up 14 16 18 stitches along the round 1 k to 3 sts before instep k2tog side of the heel flap and then knit across k1 k1 ssk k to last 3 sts of instep to the marker k2tog k1 k1 ssk k to end of round round 2 k all sts repeat rounds 1 and 2 until 28 32 36 st remain repeat round1 until 14 16 18 st remain close toe with kitchener stitch weave in all ends
